items.name: Savanna Soccer Safari
items.short_description: Kids can kick goals on a mini-pitch surrounded by savanna murals, complete with soft, inflatable wildlife obstacles.
items.address: Amboseli Central Plains, near Observation Hill

items.name: Elephant Ball Hoops
items.short_description: A basketball court scaled for children, featuring adjustable hoops and elephant-themed backboards for a unique game experience.

items.name: Cheetah Sprint Track
items.short_description: A short, padded running track designed for kids to race and test their speed in a safe, fun environment.
items.address: Kimana Gate Sector, Amboseli Family Zone

items.name: Maasai Archery Fun
items.short_description: Learn basic archery skills with child-safe bows and suction-cup arrows, aiming at animal targets inspired by local wildlife.

items.name: Kilimanjaro Builders' Peak
items.short_description: A massive indoor area filled with LEGO bricks, where children can construct their own versions of Mount Kilimanjaro, safari vehicles, or local structures.
items.address: Amboseli Central Family Zone, near Ol Tukai Lodge

items.name: Safari Animal Creator Hub
items.short_description: Kids use various construction toys (LEGO, Duplo, magnetic tiles) to build their favorite safari animals, from elephants to giraffes.

items.name: Maasai Village Brickworks
items.short_description: An interactive zone where children can build miniature Maasai huts and bomas using oversized, soft building blocks, learning about local culture.
items.address: Amboseli Cultural Hub, near Maasai Manyatta visits

items.name: Amboseli Engineering Explorers
items.short_description: A hands-on construction park with simple machines and large foam blocks, encouraging collaborative building of bridges, towers, and forts.

items.name: The Great Elephant Tusk Hunt
items.short_description: A park-wide scavenger hunt where children follow clues and solve riddles to find 'hidden tusks' (replicas) and learn about elephant conservation.
items.address: Amboseli Family Adventure Zone, near Observation Hill

items.name: Junior Ranger Wildlife Quest
items.short_description: Equipped with binoculars and a map, kids embark on a guided quest to 'spot' (find hidden figures of) specific animals and complete a ranger checklist.

items.name: Kilimanjaro Expedition Challenge
items.short_description: An obstacle course designed to simulate a mini-expedition, with climbing walls, rope bridges, and 'lava' pits (soft play areas).

items.name: Secret of the Savanna Treasure Maze
items.short_description: A cleverly designed hedge maze with interactive stations inside, where children answer questions about Amboseli's ecosystem to unlock the next path.

items.name: Encounter with Ellie the Elephant
items.short_description: Meet Ellie, Amboseli's friendly elephant mascot, for hugs, photos, and stories about her savanna adventures.

items.name: Leo the Lion's Roaring Welcome
items.short_description: Children can interact with Leo, the playful lion character, sharing high-fives and listening to his tales of courage and friendship.

items.name: Zola the Zebra's Stripey Hugs
items.short_description: Get striped up with Zola the Zebra, a cheerful character who loves to give hugs and share fun facts about her fellow savanna friends.

items.name: Koko the Kudu's Clever Corner
items.short_description: Join Koko the Kudu for storytelling sessions and a chance to meet and snap pictures with this wise and gentle character.

items.name: Little Rangers' Discovery Den
items.short_description: An interactive museum space where children learn about wildlife tracking, animal sounds, and the roles of park rangers through hands-on exhibits.
items.address: Amboseli Education Hub, near Main Gate

items.name: The Amboseli Ecosystem Explorer
items.short_description: Explore a miniature diorama of Amboseli, understanding its diverse habitats, water sources, and the animals that call it home.

items.name: Maasai Heritage Kids' Gallery
items.short_description: A vibrant gallery introducing children to Maasai culture through traditional artifacts, dress-up stations, and interactive craft activities.

items.name: Save Our Elephants! Lab
items.short_description: Engaging exhibits focusing on elephant conservation, explaining their intelligence, social structures, and the importance of protecting them, with interactive puzzles and games.

items.name: Junior Keeper's Farm Friends
items.short_description: A safe area where children can meet and gently interact with rescued domestic farm animals, learning about their care and feeding.
items.address: Amboseli Wildlife Rescue Centre, Farm Animal Section

items.name: Reptile & Insect Discovery Dome
items.short_description: An educational dome showcasing local non-mammalian wildlife like harmless reptiles and fascinating insects, with supervised viewing and touch opportunities.

items.name: Bird Aviary & Feathered Friends
items.short_description: Walk through a large, enclosed aviary with various non-migratory bird species native to Amboseli, offering close-up viewing and educational signs.

items.name: Orphaned Wildlife Observation Hub
items.short_description: A viewing area dedicated to young, rescued wildlife (e.g., small antelopes, birds) under rehabilitation, with strict no-touch policies but educational talks.

items.name: Kilimanjaro Climb & Slide
items.short_description: A multi-level play structure resembling Mount Kilimanjaro, featuring climbing nets, tunnels, and exhilarating slides for all ages.
items.address: Amboseli Family Fun Zone, near Satao Elerai Camp

items.name: Elephant Trails Adventure Park
items.short_description: An expansive adventure park with themed swings, balancing beams, and a mini zip-line, all designed with elephant footprints and savanna motifs.

items.name: Acacia Treehouse Playground
items.short_description: Explore interconnected treehouses and rope bridges nestled amongst simulated acacia trees, offering elevated views and imaginative play spaces.

items.name: Savanna Splash Pad Oasis
items.short_description: A water play area with gentle sprays, ground geysers, and mini water slides, perfect for cooling off on a hot Amboseli day.
items.address: Amboseli Family Relaxation Area, near Amboseli Sopa Lodge

items.name: Whispering Baobab Tales
items.short_description: Gather under the shade of a large baobab replica for engaging storytelling sessions featuring traditional African fables and animal folklore.
items.address: Amboseli Cultural Story Gardens, central zone

items.name: Maasai Legends Fire Circle
items.short_description: An evening experience around a safe, simulated fire pit, where Maasai elders or cultural guides share ancient legends and proverbs.

items.name: Animal Voices Amphitheater
items.short_description: A natural amphitheater where performers bring to life stories from the animal kingdom, using puppets, songs, and interactive participation.

items.name: The River of Rhymes & Riddles
items.short_description: A winding path along a gentle stream (or simulated one) with stations featuring carved animal figures, each inspiring a rhyme or riddle about Amboseli's creatures.

items.name: Amboseli Wetland Wonders Tank
items.short_description: A specialized exhibit showcasing the fish, amphibians, and aquatic insects found in Amboseli's unique spring-fed wetlands, highlighting their ecological importance.
items.address: Near Observation Hill, Amboseli Wetland Study Centre

items.name: The Mini Pond Life Discovery Lab
items.short_description: Children can use magnifying glasses and microscopes at interactive stations to observe microscopic organisms and small creatures from local ponds.

items.name: Fish of the Chyulu Hills Springs Exhibit
items.short_description: Learn about the hardy fish species that thrive in the freshwater springs originating from the Chyulu Hills, providing vital water for the park.

items.name: Crocodylus Corner (Interactive Monitor)
items.short_description: This interactive digital display teaches children about crocodiles and their role in Amboseli's ecosystem, with virtual encounters and fascinating facts.

items.name: Savanna Soft Play Expedition
items.short_description: A multi-level indoor soft play area featuring slides, ball pits, and climbing structures, all decorated with friendly savanna animal themes.
items.address: Amboseli Family Hub, near Kibo Safari Camp

items.name: Bush Baby Bouncing Arena
items.short_description: An inflatable bounce house and obstacle course zone, allowing kids to jump, climb, and tumble safely, perfect for energetic play on rainy days.

items.name: Junior Explorer's Craft Corner
items.short_description: A cozy indoor space dedicated to creative arts and crafts, where children can draw, paint, and make safari-themed souvenirs.

items.name: The Rhino's Retreat Arcade
items.short_description: A small arcade with age-appropriate games, including air hockey, mini basketball, and simulation rides, offering a fun break from outdoor adventures.
items.address: Amboseli Game Zone, near Amboseli Sopa Lodge
